title: BohPTS x20 Interlude
subtitle: We're back — better than ever
description:
We're coming back with a grand opening! Over the past six months, thanks to your support, we've improved stability, refined gameplay, and strengthened balance for mid-war clans and solo players.

80% classic preserved, 20% — carefully crafted updates that make the game fresh, dynamic, and truly exciting in 2025.
